Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure with amendments. Without written report.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks
Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to establish a Boundary for the Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Monument, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Establishes the boundary of the Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Monument in Colorado. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Boundary for the Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Monument, and for other purposes.
